deepseek-ai/DeepSeek-OCR

An OCR model for visual text compression

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • DeepSeek-VL2, a vision-language AI modelfor tasks like visual question answeringand OCR
  • Offline OCR using DeepSeek-OCR AI
  • OCR app with PDF processing and document conversion
  • unified multimodal model for both understanding and generating images and text
  • Reproduces DeepSeek-OCR using VILA codebase
  • Desktop GUI for real-time OCR with GPU acceleration
  • Rust implementation of DeepSeek-OCR inference stack
  • Generates synthetic text images for OCR training
  • OCR utility for copying text from images or videos
  • 7B text-to-image model for text rendering
